医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新辅助化疗可以消除乳腺癌区域淋巴结照射的需要根据 NRG 的结果，对于新辅助化疗后乳腺癌从淋巴结阳性转变为淋巴结阴性的患者，跳过辅助区域淋巴结照射 (RNI) 并不会增加术后五年疾病复发或死亡的风险肿瘤学/NSABP B-51/RTOG 1304 临床试验在 2023 年 12 月 5 日至 9 日举行的圣安东尼奥乳腺癌研讨会上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Neoadjuvant-chemotherapy-can-eliminate-need-for-regional-nodal-irradiation-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Neoadjuvant-chemotherapy-can-eliminate-need-for-regional-nodal-irradiation-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=174cd6c1-3e1d-4ec2-8d6a-18a52531a080 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 13:02:10 -0500 Neoadjuvant chemotherapy can eliminate need for regional nodal irradiation in breast cancer
研究发现夫妻经常患有高血压根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》（美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊）上的一项新研究，如果异性伴侣中的一方配偶或伴侣患有高血压，另一方也常常也会患有高血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Couples-often-share-high-blood-Pressure-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Couples-often-share-high-blood-Pressure-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dab15ab-6fd1-4419-a801-e77fb663b271 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 12:58:28 -0500 Couples often share high blood pressure, study finds
HDAC 抑制剂可能为逆转胰腺肿瘤周围的纤维化壁提供新策略胰腺癌是最致命的癌症之一，只有大约八分之一的患者在诊断后五年内存活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/HDAC-inhibitors-may-offer-new-strategy-for-reversing-optical-wall-around-pancreatic-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/HDAC-inhibitors-may-offer-new-strategy-for-reversing-optical-wall-around-pancreatic-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9c76a24-7008-4f89-b9f2-0c084726f3cb Wed, 06 Dec 2023 12:07:47 -0500 HDAC inhibitors may offer new strategy for reversing fibrotic wall around pancreatic tumors
反复接触爆炸的军事人员表现出脑部炎症增加和结构变化一项新的研究表明，与对照组相比，反复暴露于爆炸的特种作战人员的大脑显示出更多的炎症和结构变化，这可能会增加长期与大脑相关疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Military-personnel-repeatedly-expose-to-blasts-show-increased-brain-inflammation-and-structural-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Military-personnel-repeatedly-expose-to-blasts-show-increased-brain-inflammation-and-structural-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e863efa0-4ff0-48fe-911a-fdc2b3304be0 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 12:01:20 -0500 Military personnel repeatedly exposed to blasts show increased brain inflammation and structural changes
每天两次电刺激可增强阿尔茨海默病患者的大脑可塑性并改善记忆力开放获取期刊《普通精神病学》在线发表的一项小型临床试验的结果表明，每天两次对大脑进行无创电刺激可能会促进阿尔茨海默病患者的心理过程（认知功能）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Twice-daily-electrical-stimulation-boosts-brain- Plasticity-and-improves-memory-in-Alzheimers-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Twice-daily-electrical-stimulation-boosts-brain- Plasticity-and-improves-memory-in-Alzheimers-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8c23c55-92da-42ce-bc8f-3a73f77560e9 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 11:33:32 -0500 Twice daily electrical stimulation boosts brain plasticity and improves memory in Alzheimer's patients
Evonetix 宣布与 Analog Devices 签署革命性基因合成平台协议EVONETIX LTD（“Evonetix”）是一家开发半导体规模技术以改善基因合成的公司，今天宣布与全球半导体领导者 Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI) 签署联合开发协议和商业供应协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Evonetix-Announces-Agreement-for-Revolutionary-Gene-Synthesis-Platform-With-Analog-Devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Evonetix-Announces-Agreement-for-Revolutionary-Gene-Synthesis-Platform-With-Analog-Devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92a5b9d0-b6f2-4ad3-929a-a941f5ba1b1a Wed, 06 Dec 2023 11:13:00 -0500 Evonetix Announces Agreement for Revolutionary Gene Synthesis Platform With Analog Devices
Camena Bioscience 任命 Nicola Thompson 博士为董事会主席Camena Bioscience 是一家为制药和生物技术行业提供基因的合成生物学公司，今天宣布任命 Nicola Thompson 博士为董事会主席。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Camena-Bioscience-appoints-Dr-Nicola-Thompson-as-Chair-of-the-Board.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Camena-Bioscience-appoints-Dr-Nicola-Thompson-as-Chair-of-the-Board.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86f7e272-891c-45dc-9a35-e84a42dfdad8 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 11:10:00 -0500 Camena Bioscience appoints Dr. Nicola Thompson as Chair of the Board
音乐可以成为制定有效心理健康干预措施的关键人类如何对音乐做出反应以及这种反应的生物学基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Music-could-hold-the-key-to-developmenting- effective-mental-health-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Music-could-hold-the-key-to-developing- effective-mental-health-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f86e6ffa-d6cb-4f78-87ac-c2aa05670eef Wed, 06 Dec 2023 09:23:00 -0500 Music could hold the key to developing effective mental health interventions
眶额皮质蕴藏着理解和预防抑郁症的线索《JCCP Advances》上发表的新研究表明，童年时期经历负面生活事件 (NLE) 与成年早期出现抑郁症状的风险较高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Orbitofrontal-cortex-holds-clues-for-understanding-and-preventing-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Orbitofrontal-cortex-holds-clues-for-understanding-and-preventing-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=059ced22-9000-4371-b3ec-22b9b7027be7 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 09:12:17 -0500 Orbitofrontal cortex holds clues for understanding and preventing depression
住房不稳定会增加退伍军人患阿尔茨海默病的风险最近发表在《美国老年医学会杂志》上的一项研究表明，住房不稳定的退伍军人被诊断为阿尔茨海默病或相关痴呆症 (ADRD) 的可能性比住房稳定的退伍军人高 53%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Housing-instability-heightens-Alzheimers-risk-in-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Housing-instability-heightens-Alzheimers-risk-in-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5100d9c-3f51-4984-bd19-62d3e0fbe80a Wed, 06 Dec 2023 09:00:18 -0500 Housing instability heightens Alzheimer's risk in veterans
